title: They’re Coming For Your Guns (Ep 1849)
description:
In this episode, I address the shocking new move by liberal gun grabbers to attack your Second Amendment Rights. 
News Picks:

Visa joins Mastercard and AmEx in categorizing sales from gun shops.


Rogan, Rowling and Chappelle prove the online mob has no power.



List of Trump Allies Who Had FBI Show up on Their Doorsteps or Got Subpoenas Includes a Big Name.


Americans Spent More on Taxes in 2021 Than on Food, Clothing and Health Care Combined.


A railway and port strike could happen in the coming days. 


Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
